i cannot get the subtitles to work. it is one subtitles file for two avi files... how does that work? i tried uploading the subtitles file in vlc player, but i could not select the file. please advise. thanks.
Had similar problem -- cannot load sub file for some reason. Help!
Subtitles solution: First unrar the file, then copy all files to each CD's subfolder.  Don't worry to sort which goes with which CD - this will work.
